content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information and cannot specify the exact location and directions to the venue for gymnastics events during the 1996 Summer Olympics. However, I can provide general information that the gymnastics events in the 1996 Olympics were held at the Georgia Dome in Atlanta, Georgia. Those who wanted to attend the event could use public transportation or drive to the Georgia Dome and park in nearby parking lots.
